content: **the gorge pumpkin** **skill level ** beginner friendly finished size approx 5 5 inches wide by 3 5 inches tall easy to customize for other pumpkin sizes **materials ** - super bulky 6 weight yarn i used malabrigo rasta but lby wool-ease thick & quick would work too - m/n 9/10mm crochet hook i used 10mm - scissors - measuring tape - yarn needle - fiber fill / stuffing - sticks
